         <header class="entry-header">
          <h2 class="entry-title">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/selection-for-the-3rd-intake-is-ready/" rel="bookmark">
            Selection for the 3rd intake is ready
           </a>
          </h2>
          <div class="entry-meta">
           <span class="posted-on">
            <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/selection-for-the-3rd-intake-is-ready/" rel="bookmark">
             <time class="entry-date published" datetime="2024-03-20T09:53:02+02:00">
              March 20, 2024
             </time>
             <time class="updated" datetime="2024-03-20T09:53:03+02:00">
              March 20, 2024
             </time>
            </a>
           </span>
           <span class="byline">
            <span class="author vcard">
             <a class="url fn n" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/author/coordinator1/">
              EMJM PROMISE Programme office - MUL
             </a>
            </span>
           </span>
          </div>
          <!-- .entry-meta -->
         </header>
         <!-- .entry-header -->
         <div class="entry-content">
          <p>
           After reviewing 200 valid applications, the PROMISE consortium has made its choice. 22 full Erasmus Mundus scholarships can be awarded for the 3rd intake. The notifications will be sent presently. The recipients must accept the scholarship latest until 27 March,
           <a class="read-more" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/selection-for-the-3rd-intake-is-ready/">
            Read More …
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
         <!-- .entry-content -->
         <footer class="entry-footer">
          <span class="cat-links">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/category/news/" rel="category tag">
            News
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/category/results/" rel="category tag">
            Results
           </a>
          </span>
         </footer>
         <!-- .entry-footer -->
        </article>

        <article class="post-1086 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news" id="post-1086">
         <header class="entry-header">
          <h2 class="entry-title">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/27-students-the-second-cohort-is-complete-and-started-to-prepare-their-journey/" rel="bookmark">
            27 students: The second cohort is complete and started to prepare their journey
           </a>
          </h2>
          <div class="entry-meta">
           <span class="posted-on">
            <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/27-students-the-second-cohort-is-complete-and-started-to-prepare-their-journey/" rel="bookmark">
             <time class="entry-date published" datetime="2023-04-27T14:25:07+02:00">
              April 27, 2023
             </time>
             <time class="updated" datetime="2023-04-27T14:25:09+02:00">
              April 27, 2023
             </time>
            </a>
           </span>
           <span class="byline">
            <span class="author vcard">
             <a class="url fn n" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/author/coordinator1/">
              EMJM PROMISE Programme office - MUL
             </a>
            </span>
           </span>
          </div>
          <!-- .entry-meta -->
         </header>
         <!-- .entry-header -->
         <div class="entry-content">
          <p>
           Scholarships have been accepted by 21 of our applicants. We are happy that 6 more with high ranking decided to take part as self-funded students. Our second cohort already secured their study rights in Finland, which is one requirement to
           <a class="read-more" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/27-students-the-second-cohort-is-complete-and-started-to-prepare-their-journey/">
            Read More …
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
         <!-- .entry-content -->
         <footer class="entry-footer">
          <span class="cat-links">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/category/news/" rel="category tag">
            News
           </a>
          </span>
         </footer>
         <!-- .entry-footer -->
        </article>
        <!-- #post-## -->
        <article class="post-1071 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-results" id="post-1071">
         <header class="entry-header">
          <h2 class="entry-title">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/results/evaluation-results-from-application-for-the-2nd-cohort/" rel="bookmark">
            Evaluation results from application for the 2nd cohort
           </a>
          </h2>
          <div class="entry-meta">
           <span class="posted-on">
            <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/results/evaluation-results-from-application-for-the-2nd-cohort/" rel="bookmark">
             <time class="entry-date published" datetime="2023-04-27T13:16:59+02:00">
              April 27, 2023
             </time>
             <time class="updated" datetime="2023-04-27T13:17:00+02:00">
              April 27, 2023
             </time>
            </a>
           </span>
           <span class="byline">
            <span class="author vcard">
             <a class="url fn n" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/author/coordinator1/">
              EMJM PROMISE Programme office - MUL
             </a>
            </span>
           </span>
          </div>
          <!-- .entry-meta -->
         </header>
         <!-- .entry-header -->
         <div class="entry-content">
          <p>
           All valid applications have been evaluated. The rankings in the tables below comprise several criteria. As the consortium needs to consider some other criteria as well in selecting the scholarship holders, a high ranking does not necessarily result in offering
           <a class="read-more" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/results/evaluation-results-from-application-for-the-2nd-cohort/">
            Read More …
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
         <!-- .entry-content -->
         <footer class="entry-footer">
          <span class="cat-links">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/category/results/" rel="category tag">
            Results
           </a>
          </span>
         </footer>
         <!-- .entry-footer -->
        </article>

        <article class="post-859 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news" id="post-859">
         <header class="entry-header">
          <h2 class="entry-title">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/induction-day-for-our-first-cohort/" rel="bookmark">
            Induction day for our first cohort
           </a>
          </h2>
          <div class="entry-meta">
           <span class="posted-on">
            <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/induction-day-for-our-first-cohort/" rel="bookmark">
             <time class="entry-date published" datetime="2022-09-22T13:18:21+02:00">

             </time>

           </span>
           <span class="byline">
            <span class="author vcard">
             <a class="url fn n" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/author/coordinator1/">
              EMJM PROMISE Programme office - MUL
             </a>
            </span>
           </span>
          </div>
          <!-- .entry-meta -->
         </header>
         <!-- .entry-header -->
         <div class="entry-content">
          <p>
           September 5th saw the induction day for our first students. Representatives of the four universities in the consortium met with them in Oulu and sent them off into the first semester of their master program. 21 students from 13 countries
           <a class="read-more" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/induction-day-for-our-first-cohort/">
            Read More …
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
         <!-- .entry-content -->
         <footer class="entry-footer">
          <span class="cat-links">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/category/news/" rel="category tag">
            News
           </a>
          </span>
         </footer>
         <!-- .entry-footer -->
        </article>
        <!-- #post-## -->

        <article class="post-712 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news" id="post-712">
         <header class="entry-header">
          <h2 class="entry-title">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/evaluation-of-the-first-applications-has-started/" rel="bookmark">
            Evaluation of the first applications has started
           </a>
          </h2>
          <div class="entry-meta">
           <span class="posted-on">
            <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/evaluation-of-the-first-applications-has-started/" rel="bookmark">

             </time>
             <time class="updated" datetime="2022-04-01T09:01:53+02:00">

             </time>
            </a>
           </span>
           <span class="byline">
            <span class="author vcard">
             <a class="url fn n" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/author/coordinator1/">

             </a>
            </span>
           </span>
          </div>
          <!-- .entry-meta -->
         </header>
         <!-- .entry-header -->
         <div class="entry-content">
          <p>
           The application period being over, assessment of the submitted applications for our first academic year has commenced. Thank you for your interest in PROMISE and stay tuned!

        <article class="post-1 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news" id="post-1">
         <header class="entry-header">
          <h2 class="entry-title">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/welcome/" rel="bookmark">
            Welcome to EMJM PROMISE. The Erasmus Mundus Joint Master in Sustainable Mineral and Metal Processing Engineering
           </a>
          </h2>
          <div class="entry-meta">
           <span class="posted-on">
            <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/welcome/" rel="bookmark">
             <time class="entry-date published" datetime="2022-02-27T07:11:13+02:00">
              February 27, 2022
             </time>
             <time class="updated" datetime="2022-04-01T08:54:14+02:00">
              April 1, 2022
             </time>
            </a>
           </span>
           <span class="byline">
            <span class="author vcard">
             <a class="url fn n" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/author/admin/">
              EMJM PROMISE Programme office - UOULU
             </a>
            </span>
           </span>
          </div>
          <!-- .entry-meta -->
         </header>
         <!-- .entry-header -->
         <div class="entry-content">
          <p>
           Applications Open! The Erasmus Mundus Joint Master in Sustainable Mineral and Metal Processing Engineering-PROMISE is being established due to the awareness of increasing demands in the quantity and diversity of minerals, metals, and materials as we move towards renewable energy,
           <a class="read-more" href="https://www.master-promise.eu/news/welcome/">
            Read More …
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
         <!-- .entry-content -->
         <footer class="entry-footer">
          <span class="cat-links">
           <a href="https://www.master-promise.eu/category/news/" rel="category tag">
            News
           </a>
          </span>
         </footer>
         <!-- .entry-footer -->
        </article>

          </div>
          <div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-2 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
           <div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
            <h1 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center">
             The driver for the EMJM PROMISE
            </h1>
            <p class="has-text-align-center">
             The Erasmus Mundus Joint Master in Sustainable Mineral and Metal Processing Engineering-EMJM PROMISE is being established due to the awareness of increasing demands in the quantity and diversity of minerals, metals, and materials as we move towards renewable energy, electromobility, digital communication and other clean-energy technologies.
            </p>
            <p class="has-text-align-center">
             PROMISE is the consortium involving the cooperation between four leading universities in mineral processing and mining engineering:
             <strong>
              University of Oulu from Finland (UOULU), University of Zagreb from Croatia (UNIZG), Montanuniversität Leoben from Austria (MUL) and Universidad Federico Santa Maria from Chile (USM).
             </strong>
            </p>
